text: They gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities which are mentioned by name.

name: 1 Chronicles 6:66
text: Some of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their borders out of the tribe of Ephraim.

name: 1 Chronicles 6:67
text: They gave to them the cities of refuge, Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim with its suburbs; Gezer also with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:68
text: and Jokmeam with its suburbs, and Beth Horon with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:69
text: and Aijalon with its suburbs, and Gath Rimmon with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:70
text: and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Aner with its suburbs, and Bileam with its suburbs, for the rest of the family of the sons of Kohath.

name: 1 Chronicles 6:71
text: To the sons of Gershom were given, out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with its suburbs, and Ashtaroth with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:72
text: and out of the tribe of Issachar, Kedesh with its suburbs, Daberath with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:73
text: and Ramoth with its suburbs, and Anem with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:74
text: and out of the tribe of Asher, Mashal with its suburbs, and Abdon with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:75
text: and Hukok with its suburbs, and Rehob with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:76
text: and out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its suburbs, and Hammon with its suburbs, and Kiriathaim with its suburbs.

name: 1 Chronicles 6:77
text: To the rest of the Levites, the sons of Merari, were given, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmono with its suburbs, Tabor with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:78
text: and beyond the Jordan at Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, were given them, out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with its suburbs, and Jahzah with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:79
text: and Kedemoth with its suburbs, and Mephaath with its suburbs;

name: 1 Chronicles 6:80
text: and out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its suburbs, and Mahanaim with its suburbs,

name: 1 Chronicles 6:81
text: and Heshbon with its suburbs, and Jazer with its suburbs.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:1
text: Of the sons of Issachar: Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:2
text: The sons of Tola: Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Ibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their fathers" houses, of Tola; mighty men of valor in their generations: their number in the days of David was twenty-two thousand six hundred.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:3
text: The sons of Uzzi: Izrahiah. The sons of Izrahiah: Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Isshiah, five; all of them chief men.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:4
text: With them, by their generations, after their fathers" houses, were bands of the army for war, thirty-six thousand; for they had many wives and sons.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:5
text: Their brothers among all the families of Issachar, mighty men of valor, reckoned in all by genealogy, were eighty-seven thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:6
text: The sons of Benjamin: Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:7
text: The sons of Bela: Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of fathers" houses, mighty men of valor; and they were reckoned by genealogy twenty-two thousand thirty-four.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:8
text: The sons of Becher: Zemirah, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jeremoth, and Abijah, and Anathoth, and Alemeth. All these were the sons of Becher.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:9
text: They were reckoned by genealogy, after their generations, heads of their fathers" houses, mighty men of valor, twenty thousand two hundred.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:10
text: The sons of Jediael: Bilhan. The sons of Bilhan: Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tarshish, and Ahishahar.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:11
text: All these were sons of Jediael, according to the heads of their fathers" households, mighty men of valor, seventeen thousand and two hundred, who were able to go forth in the army for war.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:12
text: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the sons of Ir, Hushim, the sons of Aher.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:13
text: The sons of Naphtali: Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:14
text: The sons of Manasseh: Asriel, whom his concubine the Aramitess bore: she bore Machir the father of Gilead:

name: 1 Chronicles 7:15
text: and Machir took a wife of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister"s name was Maacah; and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:16
text: Maacah the wife of Machir bore a son, and she named him Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:17
text: The sons of Ulam: Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:18
text: His sister Hammolecheth bore Ishhod, and Abiezer, and Mahlah.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:19
text: The sons of Shemida were Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:20
text: The sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eleadah his son, and Tahath his son,

name: 1 Chronicles 7:21
text: and Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath who were born in the land killed, because they came down to take away their livestock.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:22
text: Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brothers came to comfort him.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:23
text: He went in to his wife, and she conceived, and bore a son, and he named him Beriah, because it went evil with his house.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:24
text: His daughter was Sheerah, who built Beth Horon the lower and the upper, and Uzzen Sheerah.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:25
text: Rephah was his son, and Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,

name: 1 Chronicles 7:26
text: Ladan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,

name: 1 Chronicles 7:27
text: Nun his son, Joshua his son.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:28
text: Their possessions and habitations were Bethel and its towns, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with its towns; Shechem also and its towns, to Azzah and its towns;

name: 1 Chronicles 7:29
text: and by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth Shean and its towns, Taanach and its towns, Megiddo and its towns, Dor and its towns. In these lived the children of Joseph the son of Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:30
text: The sons of Asher: Imnah, and Ishvah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:31
text: The sons of Beriah: Heber, and Malchiel, who was the father of Birzaith.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:32
text: Heber became the father of Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:33
text: The sons of Japhlet: Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:34
text: The sons of Shemer: Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:35
text: The sons of Helem his brother: Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:36
text: The sons of Zophah: Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,

name: 1 Chronicles 7:37
text: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:38
text: The sons of Jether: Jephunneh, and Pispa, and Ara.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:39
text: The sons of Ulla: Arah, and Hanniel, and Rizia.

name: 1 Chronicles 7:40
text: All these were the children of Asher, heads of the fathers" houses, choice and mighty men of valor, chief of the princes. The number of them reckoned by genealogy for service in war was twenty-six thousand men.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:1
text: Benjamin became the father of Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:2
text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:3
text: Bela had sons: Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:4
text: and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:5
text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:6
text: These are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of fathers" households of the inhabitants of Geba, and they carried them captive to Manahath:

name: 1 Chronicles 8:7
text: and Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera, he carried them captive: and he became the father of Uzza and Ahihud.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:8
text: Shaharaim became the father of children in the field of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:9
text: He became the father of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcam,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:10
text: and Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of fathers" households.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:11
text: Of Hushim he became the father of Abitub and Elpaal.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:12
text: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod, with its towns;

name: 1 Chronicles 8:13
text: and Beriah, and Shema, who were heads of fathers" households of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who put to flight the inhabitants of Gath;

name: 1 Chronicles 8:14
text: and Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:15
text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:16
text: and Michael, and Ishpah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:17
text: and Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:18
text: and Ishmerai, and Izliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:19
text: and Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:20
text: and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:21
text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimei,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:22
text: and Ishpan, and Eber, and Eliel,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:23
text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:24
text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Anthothijah,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:25
text: and Iphdeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:26
text: and Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:27
text: and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:28
text: These were heads of fathers" households throughout their generations, chief men: these lived in Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:29
text: In Gibeon there lived the father of Gibeon, whose wife"s name was Maacah;

name: 1 Chronicles 8:30
text: and his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

name: 1 Chronicles 8:31
text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:32
text: Mikloth became the father of Shimeah. They also lived with their brothers in Jerusalem, over against their brothers.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:33
text: Ner became the father of Kish; and Kish became the father of Saul; and Saul became the father of Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:34
text: The son of Jonathan was Merib Baal; and Merib Baal became the father of Micah.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:35
text: The sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:36
text: Ahaz became the father of Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah became the father of Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri became the father of Moza.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:37
text: Moza became the father of Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:38
text: Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:39
text: The sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

name: 1 Chronicles 8:40
text: The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers, and had many sons, and sons" sons, one hundred fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:1
text: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel: and Judah was carried away captive to Babylon for their disobedience.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:2
text: Now the first inhabitants who lived in their possessions in their cities were Israel, the priests, the Levites, and the Nethinim.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:3
text: In Jerusalem lived of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim and Manasseh:

name: 1 Chronicles 9:4
text: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Perez the son of Judah.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:5
text: Of the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:6
text: Of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel, and their brothers, six hundred ninety.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:7
text: Of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah,

name: 1 Chronicles 9:8
text: and Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;

name: 1 Chronicles 9:9
text: and their brothers, according to their generations, nine hundred fifty-six. All these men were heads of fathers" households by their fathers" houses.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:10
text: Of the priests: Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, Jachin,

name: 1 Chronicles 9:11
text: and Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;

name: 1 Chronicles 9:12
text: and Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashhur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;

name: 1 Chronicles 9:13
text: and their brothers, heads of their fathers" houses, one thousand seven hundred sixty; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:14
text: Of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;

name: 1 Chronicles 9:15
text: and Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Mica, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph,

name: 1 Chronicles 9:16
text: and Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:17
text: The porters: Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brothers (Shallum was the chief),

name: 1 Chronicles 9:18
text: who previously served in the king"s gate eastward: they were the porters for the camp of the children of Levi.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:19
text: Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brothers, of his father"s house, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, keepers of the thresholds of the tent: and their fathers had been over the camp of Yahweh, keepers of the entry.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:20
text: Phinehas the son of Eleazar was ruler over them in time past, and Yahweh was with him.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:21
text: Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was porter of the door of the Tent of Meeting.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:22
text: All these who were chosen to be porters in the thresholds were two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by genealogy in their villages, whom David and Samuel the seer ordained in their office of trust.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:23
text: So they and their children had the oversight of the gates of the house of Yahweh, even the house of the tent, by wards.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:24
text: On the four sides were the porters, toward the east, west, north, and south.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:25
text: Their brothers, in their villages, were to come in every seven days from time to time to be with them:

name: 1 Chronicles 9:26
text: for the four chief porters, who were Levites, were in an office of trust, and were over the rooms and over the treasuries in the house of God.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:27
text: They lodged around the house of God, because that duty was on them; and to them pertained its opening morning by morning.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:28
text: Certain of them were in charge of the vessels of service; for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken out.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:29
text: Some of them also were appointed over the furniture, and over all the vessels of the sanctuary, and over the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:30
text: Some of the sons of the priests prepared the confection of the spices.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:31
text: Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, had the office of trust over the things that were baked in pans.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:32
text: Some of their brothers, of the sons of the Kohathites, were over the show bread, to prepare it every Sabbath.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:33
text: These are the singers, heads of fathers" households of the Levites, who lived in the rooms and were free from other service; for they were employed in their work day and night.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:34
text: These were heads of fathers" households of the Levites, throughout their generations, chief men: these lived at Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:35
text: In Gibeon there lived the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, whose wife"s name was Maacah:

name: 1 Chronicles 9:36
text: and his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,

name: 1 Chronicles 9:37
text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:38
text: Mikloth became the father of Shimeam. They also lived with their brothers in Jerusalem, over against their brothers.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:39
text: Ner became the father of Kish; and Kish became the father of Saul; and Saul became the father of Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:40
text: The son of Jonathan was Merib Baal; and Merib Baal became the father of Micah.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:41
text: The sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:42
text: Ahaz became the father of Jarah; and Jarah became the father of Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri became the father of Moza;

name: 1 Chronicles 9:43
text: and Moza became the father of Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

name: 1 Chronicles 9:44
text: Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:1
text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel: and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines, and fell down slain on Mount Gilboa.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:2
text: The Philistines followed hard after Saul and after his sons; and the Philistines killed Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchishua, the sons of Saul.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:3
text: The battle went hard against Saul, and the archers overtook him; and he was distressed by reason of the archers.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:4
text: Then Saul said to his armor bearer, "Draw your sword, and thrust me through with it, lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me." But his armor bearer would not; for he was terrified. Therefore Saul took his sword, and fell on it.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:5
text: When his armor bearer saw that Saul was dead, he likewise fell on his sword, and died.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:6
text: So Saul died, and his three sons; and all his house died together.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:7
text: When all the men of Israel who were in the valley saw that they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, they forsook their cities, and fled; and the Philistines came and lived in them.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:8
text: It happened on the next day, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen on Mount Gilboa.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:9
text: They stripped him, and took his head, and his armor, and sent into the land of the Philistines all around, to carry the news to their idols, and to the people.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:10
text: They put his armor in the house of their gods, and fastened his head in the house of Dagon.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:11
text: When all Jabesh Gilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,

name: 1 Chronicles 10:12
text: all the valiant men arose, and took away the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and brought them to Jabesh, and buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh, and fasted seven days.

name: 1 Chronicles 10:13
text: So Saul died for his trespass which he committed against Yahweh, because of the word of Yahweh, which he didn"t keep; and also because he asked counsel of one who had a familiar spirit, to inquire,

name: 1 Chronicles 10:14
text: and didn"t inquire of Yahweh: therefore he killed him, and turned the kingdom to David the son of Jesse.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:1
text: Then all Israel gathered themselves to David to Hebron, saying, "Behold, we are your bone and your flesh.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:2
text: In times past, even when Saul was king, it was you who led out and brought in Israel. Yahweh your God said to you, "You shall be shepherd of my people Israel, and you shall be prince over my people Israel.""

name: 1 Chronicles 11:3
text: So all the elders of Israel came to the king to Hebron; and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before Yahweh; and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of Yahweh by Samuel.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:4
text: David and all Israel went to Jerusalem (the same is Jebus); and the Jebusites, the inhabitants of the land, were there.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:5
text: The inhabitants of Jebus said to David, "You shall not come in here." Nevertheless David took the stronghold of Zion. The same is the city of David.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:6
text: David said, "Whoever strikes the Jebusites first shall be chief and captain." Joab the son of Zeruiah went up first, and was made chief.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:7
text: David lived in the stronghold; therefore they called it the city of David.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:8
text: He built the city all around, from Millo even around; and Joab repaired the rest of the city.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:9
text: David grew greater and greater; for Yahweh of Armies was with him.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:10
text: Now these are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who showed themselves strong with him in his kingdom, together with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of Yahweh concerning Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:11
text: This is the number of the mighty men whom David had: Jashobeam, the son of a Hachmonite, the chief of the thirty; he lifted up his spear against three hundred and killed them at one time.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:12
text: After him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighty men.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:13
text: He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where there was a plot of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:14
text: They stood in the midst of the plot, and defended it, and killed the Philistines; and Yahweh saved them by a great victory.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:15
text: Three of the thirty chief men went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the army of the Philistines were encamped in the valley of Rephaim.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:16
text: David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:17
text: David longed, and said, "Oh that one would give me water to drink of the well of Bethlehem, which is by the gate!"

name: 1 Chronicles 11:18
text: The three broke through the army of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to Yahweh,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:19
text: and said, "My God forbid it me, that I should do this! Shall I drink the blood of these men who have put their lives in jeopardy?" For they risked their lives to bring it. Therefore he would not drink it. The three mighty men did these things.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:20
text: Abishai, the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three; for he lifted up his spear against three hundred and killed them, and had a name among the three.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:21
text: Of the three, he was more honorable than the two, and was made their captain: however he didn"t attain to the three.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:22
text: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done mighty deeds, he killed the two sons of Ariel of Moab: he went down also and killed a lion in the midst of a pit in time of snow.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:23
text: He killed an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian"s hand was a spear like a weaver"s beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian"s hand, and killed him with his own spear.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:24
text: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada did these things, and had a name among the three mighty men.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:25
text: Behold, he was more honorable than the thirty, but he didn"t attain to the three: and David set him over his guard.

name: 1 Chronicles 11:26
text: Also the mighty men of the armies: Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:27
text: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:28
text: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:29
text: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:30
text: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:31
text: Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah of the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:32
text: Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:33
text: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:34
text: the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shagee the Hararite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:35
text: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:36
text: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:37
text: Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:38
text: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Hagri,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:39
text: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armor bearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:40
text: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:41
text: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:42
text: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a chief of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:43
text: Hanan the son of Maacah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:44
text: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:45
text: Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:46
text: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,

name: 1 Chronicles 11:47
text: Eliel, and Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:1
text: Now these are those who came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish; and they were among the mighty men, his helpers in war.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:2
text: They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in slinging stones and in shooting arrows from the bow: they were of Saul"s brothers of Benjamin.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:3
text: The chief was Ahiezer; then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite, and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth, and Beracah, and Jehu the Anathothite,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:4
text: and Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty, and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Jozabad the Gederathite,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:5
text: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:6
text: Elkanah, and Isshiah, and Azarel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korahites,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:7
text: and Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:8
text: Of the Gadites there separated themselves to David to the stronghold in the wilderness, mighty men of valor, men trained for war, that could handle shield and spear; whose faces were like the faces of lions, and they were as swift as the roes on the mountains;

name: 1 Chronicles 12:9
text: Ezer the chief, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:10
text: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:11
text: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:12
text: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:13
text: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbannai the eleventh.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:14
text: These of the sons of Gad were captains of the army: he who was least was equal to one hundred, and the greatest to one thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:15
text: These are those who went over the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflowed all its banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:16
text: There came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the stronghold to David.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:17
text: David went out to meet them, and answered them, "If you have come peaceably to me to help me, my heart shall be knit to you; but if you have come to betray me to my adversaries, since there is no wrong in my hands, may the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it."

name: 1 Chronicles 12:18
text: Then the Spirit came on Amasai, who was chief of the thirty, and he said, "We are yours, David, and on your side, you son of Jesse: peace, peace be to you, and peace be to your helpers; for your God helps you." Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:19
text: Of Manasseh also there fell away some to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle; but they didn"t help them; for the lords of the Philistines sent him away after consultation, saying, "He will fall away to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads."

name: 1 Chronicles 12:20
text: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zillethai, captains of thousands who were of Manasseh.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:21
text: They helped David against the band of rovers: for they were all mighty men of valor, and were captains in the army.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:22
text: For from day to day men came to David to help him, until there was a great army, like the army of God.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:23
text: These are the numbers of the heads of those who were armed for war, who came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:24
text: The children of Judah who bore shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, armed for war.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:25
text: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valor for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:26
text: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:27
text: Jehoiada was the leader of the household of Aaron; and with him were three thousand and seven hundred,

name: 1 Chronicles 12:28
text: and Zadok, a young man mighty of valor, and of his father"s house twenty-two captains.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:29
text: Of the children of Benjamin, the brothers of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept their allegiance to the house of Saul.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:30
text: Of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand eight hundred, mighty men of valor, famous men in their fathers" houses.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:31
text: Of the half-tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, who were mentioned by name, to come and make David king.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:32
text: Of the children of Issachar, men who had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do, their heads were two hundred; and all their brothers were at their commandment.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:33
text: Of Zebulun, such as were able to go out in the army, who could set the battle in array, with all kinds of instruments of war, fifty thousand, and who could command and were not of double heart.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:34
text: Of Naphtali one thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty-seven thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:35
text: Of the Danites who could set the battle in array, twenty-eight thousand six hundred.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:36
text: Of Asher, such as were able to go out in the army, who could set the battle in array, forty thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:37
text: On the other side of the Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half-tribe of Manasseh, with all kinds of instruments of war for the battle, one hundred twenty thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:38
text: All these being men of war, who could order the battle array, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:39
text: They were there with David three days, eating and drinking; for their brothers had made preparation for them.

name: 1 Chronicles 12:40
text: Moreover those who were near to them, as far as Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on donkeys, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, food of meal, cakes of figs, and clusters of raisins, and wine, and oil, and cattle, and sheep in abundance: for there was joy in Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:1
text: David consulted with the captains of thousands and of hundreds, even with every leader.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:2
text: David said to all the assembly of Israel, "If it seems good to you, and if it is of Yahweh our God, let us send abroad everywhere to our brothers who are left in all the land of Israel, with whom the priests and Levites are in their cities that have suburbs, that they may gather themselves to us;

name: 1 Chronicles 13:3
text: and let us bring again the ark of our God to us. For we didn"t seek it in the days of Saul."

name: 1 Chronicles 13:4
text: All the assembly said that they would do so; for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:5
text: So David assembled all Israel together, from the Shihor the brook of Egypt even to the entrance of Hamath, to bring the ark of God from Kiriath Jearim.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:6
text: David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, that is, to Kiriath Jearim, which belonged to Judah, to bring up from there the ark of God Yahweh that sits above the cherubim, that is called by the Name.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:7
text: They carried the ark of God on a new cart, and brought it out of the house of Abinadab: and Uzza and Ahio drove the cart.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:8
text: David and all Israel played before God with all their might, even with songs, and with harps, and with stringed instruments, and with tambourines, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:9
text: When they came to the threshing floor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:10
text: The anger of Yahweh was kindled against Uzza, and he struck him, because he put forth his hand to the ark; and there he died before God.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:11
text: David was displeased, because Yahweh had broken forth on Uzza; and he called that place Perez Uzza, to this day.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:12
text: David was afraid of God that day, saying, "How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?"

name: 1 Chronicles 13:13
text: So David didn"t move the ark to him into the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obed-Edom the Gittite.

name: 1 Chronicles 13:14
text: The ark of God remained with the family of Obed-Edom in his house three months: and Yahweh blessed the house of Obed-Edom, and all that he had.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:1
text: Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and cedar trees, and masons, and carpenters, to build him a house.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:2
text: David perceived that Yahweh had established him king over Israel; for his kingdom was exalted on high, for his people Israel"s sake.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:3
text: David took more wives at Jerusalem; and David became the father of more sons and daughters.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:4
text: These are the names of the children whom he had in Jerusalem: Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,

name: 1 Chronicles 14:5
text: and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpelet,

name: 1 Chronicles 14:6
text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

name: 1 Chronicles 14:7
text: and Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphelet.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:8
text: When the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David: and David heard of it, and went out against them.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:9
text: Now the Philistines had come and made a raid in the valley of Rephaim.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:10
text: David inquired of God, saying, "Shall I go up against the Philistines? Will you deliver them into my hand?" Yahweh said to him, "Go up; for I will deliver them into your hand."

name: 1 Chronicles 14:11
text: So they came up to Baal Perazim, and David struck them there; and David said, God has broken my enemies by my hand, like the breach of waters. Therefore they called the name of that place Baal Perazim.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:12
text: They left their gods there; and David gave commandment, and they were burned with fire.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:13
text: The Philistines yet again made a raid in the valley.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:14
text: David inquired again of God; and God said to him, "You shall not go up after them. Turn away from them, and come on them over against the mulberry trees.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:15
text: It shall be, when you hear the sound of marching in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then you shall go out to battle; for God has gone out before you to strike the army of the Philistines."

name: 1 Chronicles 14:16
text: David did as God commanded him: and they struck the army of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gezer.

name: 1 Chronicles 14:17
text: The fame of David went out into all lands; and Yahweh brought the fear of him on all nations.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:1
text: David made him houses in the city of David; and he prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:2
text: Then David said, "No one ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites. For Yahweh has chosen them to carry the ark of God, and to minister to him forever."

name: 1 Chronicles 15:3
text: David assembled all Israel at Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of Yahweh to its place, which he had prepared for it.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:4
text: David gathered together the sons of Aaron, and the Levites:

name: 1 Chronicles 15:5
text: of the sons of Kohath, Uriel the chief, and his brothers one hundred twenty;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:6
text: of the sons of Merari, Asaiah the chief, and his brothers two hundred twenty;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:7
text: of the sons of Gershom, Joel the chief, and his brothers one hundred thirty;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:8
text: of the sons of Elizaphan, Shemaiah the chief, and his brothers two hundred;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:9
text: of the sons of Hebron, Eliel the chief, and his brothers eighty;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:10
text: of the sons of Uzziel, Amminadab the chief, and his brothers one hundred twelve.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:11
text: David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,

name: 1 Chronicles 15:12
text: and said to them, "You are the heads of the fathers" households of the Levites. Sanctify yourselves, both you and your brothers, that you may bring up the ark of Yahweh, the God of Israel, to the place that I have prepared for it.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:13
text: For because you didn"t carry it at first, Yahweh our God made broke out against us, because we didn"t seek him according to the ordinance."

name: 1 Chronicles 15:14
text: So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of Yahweh, the God of Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:15
text: The children of the Levites bore the ark of God on their shoulders with the poles thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:16
text: David spoke to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brothers the singers, with instruments of music, stringed instruments and harps and cymbals, sounding aloud and lifting up the voice with joy.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:17
text: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brothers, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brothers, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:18
text: and with them their brothers of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Eliphelehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel, the doorkeepers.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:19
text: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were given cymbals of brass to sound aloud;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:20
text: and Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with stringed instruments set to Alamoth;

name: 1 Chronicles 15:21
text: and Mattithiah, and Eliphelehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps tuned to the eight-stringed lyre, to lead.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:22
text: Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was over the song: he instructed about the song, because he was skillful.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:23
text: Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:24
text: Shebaniah, and Joshaphat, and Nethanel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, blew the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obed-Edom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:25
text: So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of Yahweh out of the house of Obed-Edom with joy.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:26
text: It happened, when God helped the Levites who bore the ark of the covenant of Yahweh, that they sacrificed seven bulls and seven rams.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:27
text: David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites who bore the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: and David had on him an ephod of linen.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:28
text: Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of Yahweh with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, sounding aloud with stringed instruments and harps.

name: 1 Chronicles 15:29
text: It happened, as the ark of the covenant of Yahweh came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looked out at the window, and saw king David dancing and playing; and she despised him in her heart.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:1
text: They brought in the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt offerings and peace offerings before God.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:2
text: When David had made an end of offering the burnt offering and the peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:3
text: He dealt to everyone of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a portion of meat, and a cake of raisins.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:4
text: He appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of Yahweh, and to celebrate and to thank and praise Yahweh, the God of Israel:

name: 1 Chronicles 16:5
text: Asaph the chief, and second to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel, with stringed instruments and with harps; and Asaph with cymbals, sounding aloud;

name: 1 Chronicles 16:6
text: and Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually, before the ark of the covenant of God.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:7
text: Then on that day David first ordained to give thanks to Yahweh, by the hand of Asaph and his brothers.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:8
text: Oh give thanks to Yahweh. Call on his name. Make his doings known among the peoples.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:9
text: Sing to him. Sing praises to him. Tell of all his marvelous works.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:10
text: Glory in his holy name. Let the heart of those who seek Yahweh rejoice.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:11
text: Seek Yahweh and his strength. Seek his face forever more.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:12
text: Remember his marvelous works that he has done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth,

name: 1 Chronicles 16:13
text: you seed of Israel his servant, you children of Jacob, his chosen ones.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:14
text: He is Yahweh our God. His judgments are in all the earth.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:15
text: Remember his covenant forever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations,

name: 1 Chronicles 16:16
text: the covenant which he made with Abraham, his oath to Isaac.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:17
text: He confirmed the same to Jacob for a statute, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant,

name: 1 Chronicles 16:18
text: saying, "I will give you the land of Canaan, The lot of your inheritance,"

name: 1 Chronicles 16:19
text: when you were but a few men in number, yes, very few, and foreigners were in it.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:20
text: They went about from nation to nation, from one kingdom to another people.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:21
text: He allowed no man to do them wrong. Yes, he reproved kings for their sakes,

name: 1 Chronicles 16:22
text: "Don"t touch my anointed ones! Do my prophets no harm!"

name: 1 Chronicles 16:23
text: Sing to Yahweh, all the earth! Display his salvation from day to day.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:24
text: Declare his glory among the nations, and his marvelous works among all the peoples.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:25
text: For great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised. He also is to be feared above all gods.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:26
text: For all the gods of the peoples are idols, but Yahweh made the heavens.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:27
text: Honor and majesty are before him. Strength and gladness are in his place.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:28
text: Ascribe to Yahweh, you relatives of the peoples, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength!

name: 1 Chronicles 16:29
text: Ascribe to Yahweh the glory due to his name. Bring an offering, and come before him. Worship Yahweh in holy array.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:30
text: Tremble before him, all the earth. The world also is established that it can"t be moved.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:31
text: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice! Let them say among the nations, "Yahweh reigns!"

name: 1 Chronicles 16:32
text: Let the sea roar, and its fullness! Let the field exult, and all that is therein!

name: 1 Chronicles 16:33
text: Then the trees of the forest will sing for joy before Yahweh, for he comes to judge the earth.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:34
text: Oh give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:35
text: Say, "Save us, God of our salvation! Gather us together and deliver us from the nations, to give thanks to your holy name, to triumph in your praise."

name: 1 Chronicles 16:36
text: Blessed be Yahweh, the God of Israel, from everlasting even to everlasting. All the people said, "Amen," and praised Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:37
text: So he left there, before the ark of the covenant of Yahweh, Asaph and his brothers, to minister before the ark continually, as every day"s work required;

name: 1 Chronicles 16:38
text: and Obed-Edom with their brothers, sixty-eight; Obed-Edom also the son of Jeduthun and Hosah to be doorkeepers;

name: 1 Chronicles 16:39
text: and Zadok the priest, and his brothers the priests, before the tabernacle of Yahweh in the high place that was at Gibeon,

name: 1 Chronicles 16:40
text: to offer burnt offerings to Yahweh on the altar of burnt offering continually morning and evening, even according to all that is written in the law of Yahweh, which he commanded to Israel;

name: 1 Chronicles 16:41
text: and with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest who were chosen, who were mentioned by name, to give thanks to Yahweh, because his loving kindness endures forever;

name: 1 Chronicles 16:42
text: and with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should sound aloud, and with instruments for the songs of God; and the sons of Jeduthun to be at the gate.

name: 1 Chronicles 16:43
text: All the people departed every man to his house: and David returned to bless his house.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:1
text: It happened, when David lived in his house, that David said to Nathan the prophet, "Behold, I dwell in a house of cedar, but the ark of the covenant of Yahweh is under curtains."

name: 1 Chronicles 17:2
text: Nathan said to David, "Do all that is in your heart; for God is with you."

name: 1 Chronicles 17:3
text: It happened the same night, that the word of God came to Nathan, saying,

name: 1 Chronicles 17:4
text: "Go and tell David my servant, "Thus says Yahweh, "You shall not build me a house to dwell in;

name: 1 Chronicles 17:5
text: for I have not lived in a house since the day that I brought up Israel, to this day, but have gone from tent to tent, and from one tent to another.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:6
text: In all places in which I have walked with all Israel, did I speak a word with any of the judges of Israel, whom I commanded to be shepherd of my people, saying, "Why have you not built me a house of cedar?"""

name: 1 Chronicles 17:7
text: "Now therefore, you shall tell my servant David, "Thus says Yahweh of Armies, "I took you from the sheep pen, from following the sheep, that you should be prince over my people Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:8
text: I have been with you wherever you have gone, and have cut off all your enemies from before you. I will make you a name, like the name of the great ones who are in the earth.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:9
text: I will appoint a place for my people Israel, and will plant them, that they may dwell in their own place, and be moved no more; neither shall the children of wickedness waste them any more, as at the first,

name: 1 Chronicles 17:10
text: and from the day that I commanded judges to be over my people Israel; and I will subdue all your enemies. Moreover I tell you that Yahweh will build you a house.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:11
text: It shall happen, when your days are fulfilled that you must go to be with your fathers, that I will set up your seed after you, who shall be of your sons; and I will establish his kingdom.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:12
text: He shall build me a house, and I will establish his throne forever.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:13
text: I will be his father, and he shall be my son. I will not take my loving kindness away from him, as I took it from him that was before you;

name: 1 Chronicles 17:14
text: but I will settle him in my house and in my kingdom forever. His throne shall be established forever."""

name: 1 Chronicles 17:15
text: According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so Nathan spoke to David.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:16
text: Then David the king went in, and sat before Yahweh; and he said, "Who am I, Yahweh God, and what is my house, that you have brought me thus far?

name: 1 Chronicles 17:17
text: This was a small thing in your eyes, God; but you have spoken of your servant"s house for a great while to come, and have respected me according to the estate of a man of high degree, Yahweh God.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:18
text: What can David say yet more to you concerning the honor which is done to your servant? For you know your servant.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:19
text: Yahweh, for your servant"s sake, and according to your own heart, you have worked all this greatness, to make known all these great things.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:20
text: Yahweh, there is none like you, neither is there any God besides you, according to all that we have heard with our ears.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:21
text: What one nation in the earth is like your people Israel, whom God went to redeem to himself for a people, to make you a name by great and awesome things, in driving out nations from before your people, whom you redeem out of Egypt?

name: 1 Chronicles 17:22
text: For your people Israel you made your own people forever; and you, Yahweh, became their God.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:23
text: Now, Yahweh, let the word that you have spoken concerning your servant, and concerning his house, be established forever, and do as you have spoken.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:24
text: Let your name be established and magnified forever, saying, "Yahweh of Armies is the God of Israel, even a God to Israel. The house of David your servant is established before you."

name: 1 Chronicles 17:25
text: For you, my God, have revealed to your servant that you will build him a house. Therefore your servant has found courage to pray before you.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:26
text: Now, Yahweh, you are God, and have promised this good thing to your servant.

name: 1 Chronicles 17:27
text: Now it has pleased you to bless the house of your servant, that it may continue forever before you; for you, Yahweh, have blessed, and it is blessed forever."

name: 1 Chronicles 18:1
text: After this it happened, that David struck the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and its towns out of the hand of the Philistines.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:2
text: He struck Moab; and the Moabites became servants to David, and brought tribute.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:3
text: David struck Hadadezer king of Zobah to Hamath, as he went to establish his dominion by the river Euphrates.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:4
text: David took from him one thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen; and David hamstrung all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for one hundred chariots.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:5
text: When the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadadezer king of Zobah, David struck of the Syrians twenty-two thousand men.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:6
text: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus; and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought tribute. Yahweh gave victory to David wherever he went.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:7
text: David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:8
text: From Tibhath and from Cun, cities of Hadadezer, David took very much brass, with which Solomon made the bronze sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:9
text: When Tou king of Hamath heard that David had struck all the army of Hadadezer king of Zobah,

name: 1 Chronicles 18:10
text: he sent Hadoram his son to king David, to Greet him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer and struck him; (for Hadadezer had wars with Tou;) and he had with him all kinds of vessels of gold and silver and brass.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:11
text: King David also dedicated these to Yahweh, with the silver and the gold that he carried away from all the nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:12
text: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah struck of the Edomites in the Valley of Salt eighteen thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:13
text: He put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became servants to David. Yahweh gave victory to David wherever he went.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:14
text: David reigned over all Israel; and he executed justice and righteousness to all his people.

name: 1 Chronicles 18:15
text: Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the army; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;

name: 1 Chronicles 18:16
text: and Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were priests; and Shavsha was scribe;

name: 1 Chronicles 18:17
text: and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:1
text: It happened after this, that Nahash the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned in his place.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:2
text: David said, "I will show kindness to Hanun the son of Nahash, because his father showed kindness to me." So David sent messengers to comfort him concerning his father. David"s servants came into the land of the children of Ammon to Hanun, to comfort him.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:3
text: But the princes of the children of Ammon said to Hanun, "Do you think that David honors your father, in that he has sent comforters to you? Haven"t his servants come to you to search, to overthrow, and to spy out the land?"

name: 1 Chronicles 19:4
text: So Hanun took David"s servants, and shaved them, and cut off their garments in the middle, even to their buttocks, and sent them away.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:5
text: Then there went certain persons, and told David how the men were served. He sent to meet them; for the men were greatly ashamed. The king said, "Stay at Jericho until your beards have grown, and then return."

name: 1 Chronicles 19:6
text: When the children of Ammon saw that they had made themselves odious to David, Hanun and the children of Ammon sent one thousand talents of silver to hire them chariots and horsemen out of Mesopotamia, and out of Arammaacah, and out of Zobah.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:7
text: So they hired for themselves thirty-two thousand chariots, and the king of Maacah and his people, who came and encamped before Medeba. The children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities, and came to battle.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:8
text: When David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the army of the mighty men.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:9
text: The children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array at the gate of the city: and the kings who had come were by themselves in the field.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:10
text: Now when Joab saw that the battle was set against him before and behind, he chose of all the choice men of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:11
text: The rest of the people he committed into the hand of Abishai his brother; and they put themselves in array against the children of Ammon.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:12
text: He said, "If the Syrians are too strong for me, then you are to help me; but if the children of Ammon are too strong for you, then I will help you.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:13
text: Be courageous, and let us be strong for our people, and for the cities of our God. May Yahweh do that which seems good to him."

name: 1 Chronicles 19:14
text: So Joab and the people who were with him drew near before the Syrians to the battle; and they fled before him.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:15
text: When the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians had fled, they likewise fled before Abishai his brother, and entered into the city. Then Joab came to Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:16
text: When the Syrians saw that they were defeated by Israel, they sent messengers, and drew forth the Syrians who were beyond the River, with Shophach the captain of the army of Hadadezer at their head.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:17
text: It was told David; and he gathered all Israel together, and passed over the Jordan, and came on them, and set the battle in array against them. So when David had put the battle in array against the Syrians, they fought with him.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:18
text: The Syrians fled before Israel; and David killed of the Syrians the men of seven thousand chariots, and forty thousand footmen, and killed Shophach the captain of the army.

name: 1 Chronicles 19:19
text: When the servants of Hadadezer saw that they were defeated by Israel, they made peace with David, and served him: neither would the Syrians help the children of Ammon any more.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:1
text: It happened, at the time of the return of the year, at the time when kings go out, that Joab led forth the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David stayed at Jerusalem. Joab struck Rabbah, and overthrew it.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:2
text: David took the crown of their king from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set on David"s head: and he brought forth the spoil of the city, exceeding much.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:3
text: He brought forth the people who were therein, and cut them with saws, and with iron picks, and with axes. David did so to all the cities of the children of Ammon. David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:4
text: It happened after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines: then Sibbecai the Hushathite killed Sippai, of the sons of the giant; and they were subdued.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:5
text: There was again war with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair killed Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, the staff of whose spear was like a weaver"s beam.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:6
text: There was again war at Gath, where there was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were twenty-four, six on each hand, and six on each foot; and he also was born to the giant.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:7
text: When he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David"s brother killed him.

name: 1 Chronicles 20:8
text: These were born to the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:1
text: Satan stood up against Israel, and moved David to number Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:2
text: David said to Joab and to the princes of the people, "Go, number Israel from Beersheba even to Dan; and bring me word, that I may know the sum of them."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:3
text: Joab said, "May Yahweh make his people a hundred times as many as they are. But, my lord the king, aren"t they all my lord"s servants? Why does my lord require this thing? Why will he be a cause of guilt to Israel?"

name: 1 Chronicles 21:4
text: Nevertheless the king"s word prevailed against Joab. Therefore Joab departed, and went throughout all Israel, and came to Jerusalem.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:5
text: Joab gave up the sum of the numbering of the people to David. All those of Israel were one million one hundred thousand men who drew sword: and in Judah were four hundred seventy thousand men who drew sword.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:6
text: But he didn"t count Levi and Benjamin among them; for the king"s word was abominable to Joab.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:7
text: God was displeased with this thing; therefore he struck Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:8
text: David said to God, "I have sinned greatly, in that I have done this thing. But now, put away, I beg you, the iniquity of your servant; for I have done very foolishly."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:9
text: Yahweh spoke to Gad, David"s seer, saying,

name: 1 Chronicles 21:10
text: "Go and speak to David, saying, "Thus says Yahweh, "I offer you three things. Choose one of them, that I may do it to you."""

name: 1 Chronicles 21:11
text: So Gad came to David, and said to him, "Thus says Yahweh, "Take your choice:

name: 1 Chronicles 21:12
text: either three years of famine; or three months to be consumed before your foes, while the sword of your enemies overtakes you; or else three days the sword of Yahweh, even pestilence in the land, and the angel of Yahweh destroying throughout all the borders of Israel. Now therefore consider what answer I shall return to him who sent me.""

name: 1 Chronicles 21:13
text: David said to Gad, "I am in distress. Let me fall, I pray, into the hand of Yahweh; for his mercies are very great. Let me not fall into the hand of man."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:14
text: So Yahweh sent a pestilence on Israel; and seventy thousand men of Israel fell.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:15
text: God sent an angel to Jerusalem to destroy it. As he was about to destroy, Yahweh saw, and he relented of the disaster, and said to the destroying angel, "It is enough; now stay your hand." The angel of Yahweh was standing by the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:16
text: David lifted up his eyes, and saw the angel of Yahweh standing between earth and the sky, having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. Then David and the elders, clothed in sackcloth, fell on their faces.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:17
text: David said to God, "Isn"t it I who commanded the people to be numbered? It is even I who have sinned and done very wickedly; but these sheep, what have they done? Please let your hand, O Yahweh my God, be against me, and against my father"s house; but not against your people, that they should be plagued."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:18
text: Then the angel of Yahweh commanded Gad to tell David that David should go up, and raise an altar to Yahweh in the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:19
text: David went up at the saying of Gad, which he spoke in the name of Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:20
text: Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons who were with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:21
text: As David came to Ornan, Ornan looked and saw David, and went out of the threshing floor, and bowed himself to David with his face to the ground.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:22
text: Then David said to Ornan, "Give me the place of this threshing floor, that I may build thereon an altar to Yahweh. You shall sell it to me for the full price, that the plague may be stopped from afflicting the people."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:23
text: Ornan said to David, "Take it for yourself, and let my lord the king do that which is good in his eyes. Behold, I give the oxen for burnt offerings, and the threshing instruments for wood, and the wheat for the meal offering. I give it all."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:24
text: King David said to Ornan, "No; but I will most certainly buy it for the full price. For I will not take that which is yours for Yahweh, nor offer a burnt offering without cost."

name: 1 Chronicles 21:25
text: So David gave to Ornan six hundred shekels of gold by weight for the place.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:26
text: David built an altar to Yahweh there, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings, and called on Yahweh; and he answered him from the sky by fire on the altar of burnt offering.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:27
text: Yahweh commanded the angel; and he put up his sword again into its sheath.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:28
text: At that time, when David saw that Yahweh had answered him in the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite, then he sacrificed there.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:29
text: For the tabernacle of Yahweh, which Moses made in the wilderness, and the altar of burnt offering, were at that time in the high place at Gibeon.

name: 1 Chronicles 21:30
text: But David couldn"t go before it to inquire of God; for he was afraid because of the sword of the angel of Yahweh.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:1
text: Then David said, "This is the house of Yahweh God, and this is the altar of burnt offering for Israel."

name: 1 Chronicles 22:2
text: David gave orders to gather together the foreigners who were in the land of Israel; and he set masons to cut worked stones to build the house of God.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:3
text: David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates, and for the couplings; and brass in abundance without weight;

name: 1 Chronicles 22:4
text: and cedar trees without number: for the Sidonians and they of Tyre brought cedar trees in abundance to David.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:5
text: David said, "Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house that is to be built for Yahweh must be exceedingly magnificent, of fame and of glory throughout all countries. I will therefore make preparation for it." So David prepared abundantly before his death.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:6
text: Then he called for Solomon his son, and commanded him to build a house for Yahweh, the God of Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:7
text: David said to Solomon his son, "As for me, it was in my heart to build a house to the name of Yahweh my God.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:8
text: But the word of Yahweh came to me, saying, "You have shed blood abundantly, and have made great wars. You shall not build a house to my name, because you have shed much blood on the earth in my sight.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:9
text: Behold, a son shall be born to you, who shall be a man of rest. I will give him rest from all his enemies all around; for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness to Israel in his days.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:10
text: He shall build a house for my name; and he shall be my son, and I will be his father; and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever."

name: 1 Chronicles 22:11
text: Now, my son, may Yahweh be with you and prosper you, and build the house of Yahweh your God, as he has spoken concerning you.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:12
text: May Yahweh give you discretion and understanding, and put you in charge of Israel; that so you may keep the law of Yahweh your God.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:13
text: Then you will prosper, if you observe to do the statutes and the ordinances which Yahweh gave Moses concerning Israel. Be strong, and courageous. Don"t be afraid, neither be dismayed.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:14
text: Now, behold, in my affliction I have prepared for the house of Yahweh one hundred thousand talents of gold, one million talents of silver, and brass and iron without weight; for it is in abundance. I have also prepared timber and stone; and you may add to them.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:15
text: There are also workmen with you in abundance, cutters and workers of stone and timber, and all kinds of men who are skillful in every kind of work:

name: 1 Chronicles 22:16
text: of the gold, the silver, and the brass, and the iron, there is no number. Arise and be doing, and may Yahweh be with you."

name: 1 Chronicles 22:17
text: David also commanded all the princes of Israel to help Solomon his son, saying,

name: 1 Chronicles 22:18
text: "Isn"t Yahweh your God with you? Hasn"t he given you rest on every side? For he has delivered the inhabitants of the land into my hand; and the land is subdued before Yahweh, and before his people.

name: 1 Chronicles 22:19
text: Now set your heart and your soul to seek after Yahweh your God. Arise therefore, and build the sanctuary of Yahweh God, to bring the ark of the covenant of Yahweh, and the holy vessels of God, into the house that is to be built to the name of Yahweh."

name: 1 Chronicles 23:1
text: Now David was old and full of days; and he made Solomon his son king over Israel.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:2
text: He gathered together all the princes of Israel, with the priests and the Levites.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:3
text: The Levites were numbered from thirty years old and upward: and their number by their polls, man by man, was thirty-eight thousand.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:4
text: David said, "Of these, twenty-four thousand were to oversee the work of the house of Yahweh; six thousand were officers and judges;

name: 1 Chronicles 23:5
text: four thousand were doorkeepers; and four thousand praised Yahweh with the instruments which I made, for giving praise."

name: 1 Chronicles 23:6
text: David divided them into divisions according to the sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:7
text: Of the Gershonites: Ladan and Shimei.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:8
text: The sons of Ladan: Jehiel the chief, and Zetham, and Joel, three.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:9
text: The sons of Shimei: Shelomoth, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the heads of the fathers" households of Ladan.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:10
text: The sons of Shimei: Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:11
text: Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second: but Jeush and Beriah didn"t have many sons; therefore they became a fathers" house in one reckoning.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:12
text: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:13
text: The sons of Amram: Aaron and Moses; and Aaron was separated, that he should sanctify the most holy things, he and his sons, forever, to burn incense before Yahweh, to minister to him, and to bless in his name, forever.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:14
text: But as for Moses the man of God, his sons were named among the tribe of Levi.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:15
text: The sons of Moses: Gershom and Eliezer.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:16
text: The sons of Gershom: Shebuel the chief.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:17
text: The sons of Eliezer were: Rehabiah the chief; and Eliezer had no other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:18
text: The sons of Izhar: Shelomith the chief.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:19
text: The sons of Hebron: Jeriah the chief, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:20
text: The sons of Uzziel: Micah the chief, and Isshiah the second.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:21
text: The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. The sons of Mahli: Eleazar and Kish.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:22
text: Eleazar died, and had no sons, but daughters only: and their brothers the sons of Kish took them as wives.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:23
text: The sons of Mushi: Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:24
text: These were the sons of Levi after their fathers" houses, even the heads of the fathers" houses of those who were counted individually, in the number of names by their polls, who did the work for the service of the house of Yahweh, from twenty years old and upward.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:25
text: For David said, "Yahweh, the God of Israel, has given rest to his people; and he dwells in Jerusalem forever.

name: 1 Chronicles 23:26
text: Also the Levites will no longer need to carry the tabernacle and all its vessels for its service."
